**Information on the distribution, intensity, impact and economic value of mobile bottom contacting gear (MBCG) fisheries within the Celtic Seas area and associated subdivisions, and estimated consequences and costs (landings weight, landings value) of reducing their relative extent.**

#  {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

```{r ReadData, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)
library(readtext)

reg_dat <- c("Celtic Seas","Northern Celtic Sea" ,"Southern Celtic Sea")
name_dat <- c("Celtic Seas","Northern Celtic Sea" ,"Southern Celtic Sea")
reg <- 1
ecoregion <- reg_dat[reg]
econame <- name_dat[reg]

# set pathdir
pathdir_mark <- "D:\\TRADE4_Karin\\WKTRADE3\\5 - Output"

outputs <- paste(pathdir_mark,"\\(sub-)region\\",ecoregion,"\\",sep='')
outtext <- paste(pathdir_mark,"\\(sub-)region\\",ecoregion,"\\Assessment text\\",sep='')

```
